description: Valid admin login should return success
Valid customer login should return success
Valid customer2 login should return success
Admin login with uppercase email should return success
Customer login with uppercase email should return success
Login with non-existent email should return unauthorized
Admin login with wrong password should return unauthorized
Customer login with incorrect password should return unauthorized
Customer2 login with wrong password should return unauthorized
Login with invalid email should return unauthorized
Login with empty email should return validation error
Login with empty password should return validation error
Login with empty string email should return validation error
Login with empty string password should return validation error
Login with locked account should return account locked error
Login with forbidden account should return forbidden error
